categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build a Droid - Sticker Activity Book (Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens)

Star Wars: Build a Droid - Sticker Activity Book is an activity book that was released on December 18, 2015 as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens. in Australia by an Egmont UK Ltd subsidiary, Hardie Grant Egmont.

BB-8, C-3PO and their friends need your help! Fix your favourite droids by sticking in their missing parts from the sticker sheet. Packed with facts about twelve Star Wars droids, including BB-8 from the new Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens movie plus lots of colourful stickers.

Even though the Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens publishing program ended before the release of the movie of the same name, which was released on December 18, 2015, Star Wars: Build a Droid - Sticker Activity Book was released on the same day. Nevertheless, it is still considered a part of the program.
